section.general.label: General
section.clipboard.label: Clipboard History
section.transfer.label: File Transfer
section.launcher.label: Launcher
section.logging.label: Logs & Diagnostics
general.title: Language
general.desc: Default follows system language. You can override and apply instantly.
general.glass.title: Liquid Glass
general.glass.desc: Manually tune panel opacity, blur, saturation, and brightness. Changes apply instantly and persist automatically.
general.import.title: Import Locale Pack
general.import.desc: Import JSON locale files into runtime overlay directory. Overlay entries take precedence over builtin copy.
general.import.emptyFile: Import failed: please select a JSON file first
clipboard.title: Clipboard history
clipboard.desc: Clipboard history is constrained by item count and total size.
clipboard.helper: When exceeded, oldest items are deleted by time (including pinned items).
clipboard.sizeCleanupEnabledDesc: Only controls size-threshold cleanup. Max items limit always applies.
clipboard.sizeCustomInputHint: Custom mode selected. Enter a size threshold in MB.
clipboard.sizeHelperEnabled: When exceeded, oldest items are removed automatically (including pinned items).
clipboard.sizeHelperDisabled: Size cleanup is disabled. Current threshold is kept for later use.
clipboard.saveFailedInvalid: Save failed: enter an integer between {min} and {max}
clipboard.saveFailedInvalidSize: Save failed: enter a size threshold between {min} and {max} MB
clipboard.saveFailedDiskLow: Save failed: low disk space (must keep at least {minMb} MB free)
launcher.title: Launcher
launcher.desc: Configure index scope, exclusion rules, and refresh strategy for app/directory/file search. Recommended defaults avoid full-disk scanning.
launcher.rootsHint: Policy version migration resets roots to the recommended scope once. You can still customize and save manually.
launcher.rootsInvalid: At least one valid root path is required.
launcher.excludes: Exclude rules (one per line, supports names, path prefixes, or * wildcards)
launcher.excludesHint: Defaults already exclude system, cache, and common dependency directories (for example node_modules/target).
launcher.saveFailedInvalid: Save failed: check roots and numeric ranges.
launcher.resetRecommended: Reset to recommended scope and rebuild
launcher.resetSuccess: Recommended scope restored and index rebuilt.
launcher.status.truncatedHint: Truncated means the index reached the current budget cap, not a build failure; adjust scope or limits if needed.
transfer.title: File transfer
transfer.desc: Configure default download path, discovery policy and security settings.
transfer.saveFailedInvalid: Save failed: check download path and cleanup days
logging.title: Logs & diagnostics
logging.desc: Control level, retention, realtime stream, and high-frequency aggregation.
logging.realtime.label: Enable realtime log stream
logging.realtime.desc: When disabled, log center won't receive realtime events; only manual refresh is available.
logging.raw.label: Allow raw detail toggle
logging.raw.desc: Disabled by default. When enabled, raw detail entry can be shown in log center (use carefully).
logging.saveFailedInput: Save failed: check logging config inputs
logging.saveFailedRange: Save failed: logging config is out of allowed range
